metadata.description: Custom plugins and skills for Claude Code

plugins.name: react-frontend
plugins.description: Frontend development with React 18+, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui. Covers component patterns, performance optimization, accessibility, security, and clean architecture principles.

plugins.name: react-fullstack
plugins.description: Fullstack development with tRPC, React Router 7, Drizzle ORM, and Supabase Auth. Covers type-safe APIs, permission systems, data modeling, and security best practices.

plugins.name: create-react-project
plugins.description: Interactive React project scaffolding with support for frontend-only or fullstack (tRPC, Drizzle, Supabase) setups.

plugins.name: docs
plugins.description: Generate project documentation (docs/, CLAUDE.md, README.md). Optionally creates PROJECT_INDEX.json for better codebase analysis.
